amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $247.5 million in funding for Economic Development Assistance Programs and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike funding for Economic Development Assistance Programs and transfer the amount of $247,500,000 to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 280 (Roll no. 243).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 280 (Roll no. 243).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Pompeo.
